listitem.para: how many pluto helpers are started to help with cryptographic operations. Pluto will start as many helpers as the number of CPU's, minus 1 to dedicate to the main thread. For machines with less than 4 CPU's, an equal number of helpers to CPU's are started. A value of 0 forces pluto to do all operations inline using the main process. A value of -1 tells pluto to perform the above calculation. Any other value forces the number to that amount.
